data.title: The Conjugal Bed (1963 film)
data.meta_description: The Conjugal Bed (Italian L'ape regina) is a 1963 Italian comedy film directed by Marco Ferreri. It was entered into the 1963 Cannes Film Festival where Marina Vlady won the award for Best Actress. A girl, a friend of the family of Phillips, arrives in southern Italy to visit them. data.text:
Plot

A girl, a friend of the family of Phillips, arrives in southern Italy to visit them. She discovers that the husband is a rough and domineering man, but full of weaknesses, as his wife, not at all calls and weakened by that behavior, behaves in a whimsical tone with very demanding. Then the husband decides to get rid of.

Cast

Ugo Tognazzi as Alfonso

Marina Vlady as Regina

Walter Giller as Father Bariaco

Linda Sini as Mother Superior

Riccardo Fellini as Riccardo

Igi Polidoro as Igi

Nino Vingelli
